Classes/Promise.html#/validationError.name: validationError
Classes/Promise.html#/validationError.abstract: 约定验证错误，验证失败时默认使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/timeoutError.name: timeoutError
Classes/Promise.html#/timeoutError.abstract: 约定超时错误，约定超时时默认使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/init(block:).name: init(block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/init(block:).abstract: 指定操作成功和失败句柄初始化

Classes/Promise.html#/init(progress:).name: init(progress:)
Classes/Promise.html#/init(progress:).abstract: 指定操作成功、失败句柄和进度句柄初始化

Classes/Promise.html#/all(_:).name: all(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/all(_:).abstract: 全部约定，所有约定成功才返回约定结果合集；如果某一个失败了，则返回该错误信息；约定进度为所有约定总进度

Classes/Promise.html#/any(_:).name: any(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/any(_:).abstract: 某个约定，返回最先成功的约定结果；如果都失败了，返回最后一个错误信息；约定进度为最先成功的约定进度

Classes/Promise.html#/race(_:).name: race(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/race(_:).abstract: 约定竞速，返回最先结束的约定结果，不管成功或失败；约定进度为最先结束的约定进度

Classes/Promise.html#/delay(_:).name: delay(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/delay(_:).abstract: 延时约定，延时完成时必定成功

Classes/Promise.html#/retry(_:delay:bloc.name: retry(_:delay:block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/retry(_:delay:bloc.abstract: 约定重试，block需返回新创建的约定，当前约定失败时延迟指定时间后调用block创建约定并执行，直至成功或达到最大重试次数

Classes/Promise.html#/done(_:catch:final.name: done(_:catch:finally:)
Classes/Promise.html#/done(_:catch:final.abstract: 执行约定并分别回调成功、失败句柄，统一回调收尾句柄

Classes/Promise.html#/done(_:catch:progr.name: done(_:catch:progress:finally:)
Classes/Promise.html#/done(_:catch:progr.abstract: 执行约定并分别回调成功、失败句柄、进度句柄，统一回调收尾句柄

Classes/Promise.html#/then(_:).name: then(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/then(_:).abstract: 执行当前约定，成功时调用句柄处理结果或者返回下一个约定

Classes/Promise.html#/recover(_:).name: recover(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/recover(_:).abstract: 执行当前约定，失败时调用句柄恢复结果或者返回下一个约定

Classes/Promise.html#/validate(_:).name: validate(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/validate(_:).abstract: 验证约定，当前约定成功时验证结果，可返回Bool或Error?；验证通过时返回结果，验证失败时返回验证错误

Classes/Promise.html#/reduce(_:reducer:).name: reduce(_:reducer:)
Classes/Promise.html#/reduce(_:reducer:).abstract: 减少约定，当前约定结果作为初始值value，顺序使用value和数组值item调用reducer，产生新的value继续循环直至结束，类似数组reduce方法

Classes/Promise.html#/delay(_:force:).name: delay(_:force:)
Classes/Promise.html#/delay(_:force:).abstract: 约定延时，当前约定成功时延时返回结果；默认失败时不延时，可设置force强制失败时也延时

Classes/Promise.html#/timeout(_:error:).name: timeout(_:error:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/fullscreenPopGestu.name: fullscreenPopGestureEnabled
Classes/Wrapper.html#/fullscreenPopGestu.abstract: 是否启用导航栏全屏返回手势，默认NO。启用时系统返回手势失效，禁用时还原系统手势。如果只禁用系统手势，设置interactivePopGestureRecognizer.enabled即可

Classes/Wrapper.html#/isFullscreenPopGes.name: isFullscreenPopGestureRecognizer(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/isFullscreenPopGes.abstract: 判断手势是否是全局返回手势对象

Classes/Wrapper.html#/barTransitionIdent.abstract: 转场动画自定义判断标识，不相等才会启用转场。默认nil启用转场。可重写或者push前设置生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/fullscreenPopGestu.name: fullscreenPopGestureDisabled
Classes/Wrapper.html#/fullscreenPopGestu.abstract: 视图控制器是否禁用全屏返回手势，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/fullscreenPopGestu.name: fullscreenPopGestureDistance
Classes/Wrapper.html#/fullscreenPopGestu.abstract: 视图控制器全屏手势距离左侧最大距离，默认0，无限制

Classes/Wrapper.html#/backgroundView.name: backgroundView

Classes/Wrapper.html#/contentView.name: contentView
Classes/Wrapper.html#/contentView.abstract: 导航栏内容视图，iOS11+才存在，显示item和titleView等

Classes/Wrapper.html#/largeTitleView.name: largeTitleView
Classes/Wrapper.html#/largeTitleView.abstract: 导航栏大标题视图，显示时才有值。如果要设置背景色，可使用fwBackgroundView.backgroundColor

Classes/Wrapper.html#/largeTitleHeight.name: largeTitleHeight
Classes/Wrapper.html#/largeTitleHeight.abstract: 导航栏大标题高度，与是否隐藏无关

Classes/Wrapper.html#/statusBarStyle.name: statusBarStyle

Classes/Wrapper.html#/statusBarHidden.name: statusBarHidden

Classes/Wrapper.html#/navigationBarAppea.name: navigationBarAppearance
Classes/Wrapper.html#/navigationBarAppea.abstract: 当前导航栏设置，优先级高于style，设置后会在viewWillAppear:自动应用生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/navigationBarStyle.name: navigationBarStyle
Classes/Wrapper.html#/navigationBarStyle.abstract: 当前导航栏样式，默认Default，设置后才会在viewWillAppear:自动应用生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/navigationBarHidde.name: navigationBarHidden
Classes/Wrapper.html#/navigationBarHidde.abstract: 导航栏是否隐藏，默认NO，设置后才会在viewWillAppear:自动应用生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setNavigationBarHi.name: setNavigationBarHidden(_:animated:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/setNavigationBarHi.abstract: 动态隐藏导航栏，如果当前已经viewWillAppear:时立即执行

Classes/Wrapper.html#/allowsChildNavigat.name: allowsChildNavigation
Classes/Wrapper.html#/allowsChildNavigat.abstract: 是否允许child控制器修改导航栏样式，默认false

Classes/Wrapper.html#/tabBarHidden.name: tabBarHidden
Classes/Wrapper.html#/tabBarHidden.abstract: 标签栏是否隐藏，默认为NO，立即生效。如果tabBar一直存在，则用tabBar包裹navBar；如果tabBar只存在主界面，则用navBar包裹tabBar

Classes/Wrapper.html#/toolBarHidden.name: toolBarHidden
Classes/Wrapper.html#/toolBarHidden.abstract: 工具栏是否隐藏，默认为YES。需设置toolbarItems，立即生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setToolBarHidden(_.name: setToolBarHidden(_:animated:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/setToolBarHidden(_.abstract: 动态隐藏工具栏。需设置toolbarItems，立即生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/extendedLayoutEdge.name: extendedLayoutEdge

Classes/Wrapper.html#/modalTransition.name: modalTransition
Classes/Wrapper.html#/modalTransition.abstract: 视图控制器present|dismiss转场。注意会修改transitioningDelegate，且会强引用之；如需weak引用，请直接设置transitioningDelegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/viewTransition.abstract: 视图控制器push|pop转场，代理导航控制器转场，需在fwNavigationTransition设置后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setPresentTransiti.abstract: 自定义控制器present系统转场(蒙层渐变，内容向上动画)，会设置fwModalTransition

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setFadeTransition(.name: setFadeTransition(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/setFadeTransition(.abstract: 自定义控制器fade渐变转场(蒙层和内容渐变动画)，会设置fwModalTransition;

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setPopoverPresenta.abstract: 自定义控制器popover弹出效果(preferredContentSize设置大小)，会自动设置modalPresentationStyle和popoverPresentationController.delegate

Classes/Wrapper.html#/wrappedTransitionC.abstract: 包装到转场控制器(pinEdges占满父视图)，返回创建的控制器

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setPresentTransiti.abstract: 自定义视图模拟present系统转场(蒙层渐变，内容向上动画)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/toolbarDoneButton.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar完成按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认Done

Classes/Wrapper.html#/previousResponder.name: previousResponder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/previousResponder.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/goPrevious().abstract: 自动跳转前一个输入框，优先使用previousResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/keyboardHeight(_:).name: keyboardHeight(_:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/addToolbar(title:d.name: addToolbar(title:doneBlock:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/addToolbar(title:d.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定标题和完成句柄，使用默认按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/addToolbar(titleIt.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定居中标题、左侧上一个、下一个按钮和右边按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/maxHeight.abstract: 最大高度，默认CGFLOAT_MAX，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/minHeight.name: minHeight
Classes/Wrapper.html#/minHeight.abstract: 最小高度，默认0，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/heightDidChange.name: heightDidChange
Classes/Wrapper.html#/heightDidChange.abstract: 高度改变回调句柄，默认nil，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/autoHeight(maxHeig.abstract: 快捷启用自动高度，并设置最大高度和回调句柄

Classes/Wrapper.html#/commonDisplayLink(.name: commonDisplayLink(target:selector:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/commonDisplayLink(.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用target-action，自动CommonModes添加到当前的运行循环中，避免ScrollView滚动时不触发

Classes/Wrapper.html#/themeBorderColor.name: themeBorderColor

Classes/Wrapper.html#/themeShadowColor.name: themeShadowColor

Classes/Wrapper.html#/themeContents.name: themeContents
Classes/Wrapper.html#/themeContents.abstract: 设置主题内容图片，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/drawLinearGradient.abstract: 绘制渐变颜色，需要在drawRect中调用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/animate(block:comp.name: animate(block:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/animate(block:comp.abstract: 执行block动画完成后执行指定回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/dragLimit.name: dragLimit

Classes/Wrapper.html#/appDisplayName.abstract: 读取应用显示名称，未配置时读取名称

Classes/Wrapper.html#/canOpenURL(_:).name: canOpenURL(_:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/openURL(_:completi.abstract: 打开URL，支持NSString|NSURL，完成时回调，即使未配置URL SCHEME，实际也能打开成功，只要调用时已打开过对应App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/openUniversalLinks.abstract: 打开通用链接URL，支持NSString|NSURL，完成时回调。如果是iOS10+通用链接且安装了App，打开并回调YES，否则回调NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/isSystemURL(_:).name: isSystemURL(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/isSystemURL(_:).abstract: 判断URL是否是系统链接(如AppStore|电话|设置等)，支持NSString|NSURL

Classes/Wrapper.html#/isSchemeURL(_:).abstract: 判断URL是否是Scheme链接(非http|https|file链接)，支持NSString|NSURL

Classes/Wrapper.html#/openMessageControl.name: openMessageController(_:completionHandler:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/openMailController.name: openMailController(_:completionHandler:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/color(alpha:).name: color(alpha:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/color(alpha:).abstract: 获取当前颜色指定透明度的新颜色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/hexValue.name: hexValue
Classes/Wrapper.html#/hexValue.abstract: 读取颜色的十六进制值RGB，不含透明度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/hexString.name: hexString
Classes/Wrapper.html#/hexString.abstract: 读取颜色的十六进制字符串RGB，不含透明度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/hexAlphaString.abstract: 读取颜色的十六进制字符串RGBA|ARGB(透明度为1时RGB)，包含透明度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/color(hexString:al.abstract: 从十六进制字符串初始化，支持RGB、RGBA|ARGB，格式：@“20B2AA”, @“#FFFFFF"，透明度默认1.0，失败时返回clear

Classes/Wrapper.html#/addColor(_:blendMo.name: addColor(_:blendMode:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/addColor(_:blendMo.abstract: 以指定模式添加混合颜色，默认normal模式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/brightnessColor(_:.abstract: 当前颜色修改亮度比率的颜色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/alphaImage.abstract: 如果没有透明通道，增加透明通道

Classes/Wrapper.html#/appIconImage(size:.abstract: 获取AppIcon指定尺寸图片，名称格式：AppIcon60x60

Classes/Wrapper.html#/image(pdf:size:).abstract: 从Pdf数据或者路径创建指定大小UIImage

Classes/Wrapper.html#/enablePopProxy().name: enablePopProxy()

Classes/Wrapper.html#/shapeImage(_:strok.name: shapeImage(_:strokeWidth:strokeColor:fillColor:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/shapeLayer(_:strok.name: shapeLayer(_:strokeWidth:strokeColor:fillColor:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/shapeLayer(_:strok.abstract: 绘制形状Layer，自定义画笔宽度、画笔颜色、填充颜色，填充颜色为nil时不执行填充

Classes/Wrapper.html#/quadCurvedPath(poi.name: quadCurvedPath(points:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/quadCurvedPath(poi.abstract: 根据点计算贝塞尔曲线路径

Classes/Wrapper.html#/linePoints(rect:di.name: linePoints(rect:direction:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setDeviceTokenData.name: setDeviceTokenData(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/setDeviceTokenData.abstract: 设置设备token原始Data，格式化并保存

Classes/Wrapper.html#/deviceToken.name: deviceToken
Classes/Wrapper.html#/deviceToken.abstract: 获取设备Token格式化后的字符串

Classes/Wrapper.html#/deviceIDFV.name: deviceIDFV
Classes/Wrapper.html#/deviceIDFV.abstract: 获取设备IDFV(内部使用)，同账号应用全删除后会改变，可通过keychain持久化

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setBorderLayer(_:c.abstract: 绘制单边或多边边框Layer。frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setBorderLayer(_:c.name: setBorderLayer(_:color:width:leftInset:rightInset:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/setBorderLayer(_:c.abstract: 绘制单边或多边边框Layer。frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setDashBorderLayer.name: setDashBorderLayer(color:width:cornerRadius:lineLength:lineSpacing:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/setDashBorderLayer.abstract: 绘制四边虚线边框和四角圆角。frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/setCornerLayer(_:r.name: setCornerLayer(_:radius:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/setCornerLayer(_:r.abstract: 绘制单个或多个边框圆角，frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/FWCompoundResponseSerializer.htm.name: +compoundSerializerWithResponseSerializers:
Classes/FWCompoundResponseSerializer.htm.abstract: Creates and returns a compound serializer comprised of the specified response serializers.

Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.name: imageScale
Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.abstract: The scale factor used when interpreting the image data to construct responseImage. Specifying a scale factor of 1.0 results in an image whose size matches the pixel-based dimensions of the image. Applying a different scale factor changes the size of the image as reported by the size property. This is set to the value of scale of the main screen by default, which automatically scales images for retina displays, for instance.

Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.name: automaticallyInflatesResponseImage
Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.abstract: Whether to automatically inflate response image data for compressed formats (such as PNG or JPEG). Enabling this can significantly improve drawing performance on iOS when used with setCompletionBlockWithSuccess:failure:, as it allows a bitmap representation to be constructed in the background rather than on the main thread. YES by default.

Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.name: shouldCacheResponseData
Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.abstract: Whether to cache response data for response image. NO by default.

Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.name: +cachedResponseDataForImage:

Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.name: +clearCachedResponseDataForImage:
Classes/FWImageResponseSerializer.html#/.abstract: Clear the cached response data for response image if exists.

Classes/FWImagePreviewController.html#/c.name: sourceImageView

Classes/FWImagePreviewController.html#/c.name: sourceImageRect

Classes/FWImagePreviewController.html#/c.name: sourceImageCornerRadius

Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: baseURL
Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: The URL used to construct requests from relative paths in methods like requestWithMethod:URLString:parameters:, and the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods.

Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: requestSerializer
Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Requests created with requestWithMethod:URLString:parameters: & multipartFormRequestWithMethod:URLString:parameters:constructingBodyWithBlock: are constructed with a set of default headers using a parameter serialization specified by this property. By default, this is set to an instance of FWHTTPRequestSerializer, which serializes query string parameters for GET, HEAD, and DELETE requests, or otherwise URL-form-encodes HTTP message bodies.

Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: responseSerializer
Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Responses sent from the server in data tasks created with dataTaskWithRequest:success:failure: and run using the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods are automatically validated and serialized by the response serializer. By default, this property is set to an instance of FWJSONResponseSerializer.

Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: securityPolicy
Classes/FWHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: The security policy used by created session to evaluate server trust for secure connections. FWURLSessionManager uses the defaultPolicy unless otherwise specified. A security policy configured with FWSSLPinningModePublicKey or FWSSLPinningModeCertificate can only be applied on a session manager initialized with a secure base URL (i.e. https). Applying a security policy with pinning enabled on an insecure session manager throws an Invalid Security Policy exception.

Categories/UIButton%28FWUIKit%29.html#/c.name: fw_disabledAlpha

Categories/UILabel%28FWUIKit%29.html#/c:.name: fw_textAttributes

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showLoading
Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.abstract: 显示加载吐司，需手工隐藏，默认文本

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showLoadingWithText:

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showProgressWithText:progress:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.abstract: 显示进度条吐司，需手工隐藏，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showProgressWithText:progress:cancelBlock:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.abstract: 显示进度条吐司，默认需手工隐藏，指定cancelBlock时点击会自动隐藏并调用之，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showMessageWithText:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.abstract: 显示默认样式消息吐司，自动隐藏，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showMessageWithText:style:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.abstract: 显示指定样式消息吐司，自动隐藏，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showMessageWithText:style:completion:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.abstract: 显示指定样式消息吐司，自动隐藏，自动隐藏完成后回调，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.name: +fw_showMessageWithText:style:autoHide:interactive:completion:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWToastPlugin%29.h.abstract: 显示指定样式消息吐司，可设置自动隐藏和允许交互，自动隐藏完成后回调，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIImageView%28FWTheme%29.html.name: fw_themeImage
Categories/UIImageView%28FWTheme%29.html.abstract: 设置主题图片，自动跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil，二选一

Categories/UIImageView%28FWTheme%29.html.name: fw_themeAsset
Categories/UIImageView%28FWTheme%29.html.abstract: 设置主题图片资源，自动跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil，二选一

Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.name: +fw_themeLight:dark:
Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.abstract: 创建主题动态图片资源，分别指定浅色和深色，系统方式，推荐使用

Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.name: +fw_themeAsset:
Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.abstract: 创建主题动态图片资源，指定提供句柄，内部使用FWThemeObject实现

Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.name: fw_image
Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.abstract: 获取当前主题样式对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.name: -fw_imageForStyle:
Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.abstract: 指定主题样式获取对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.name: fw_isThemeAsset
Categories/UIImageAsset%28FWTheme%29.htm.abstract: 是否是主题图片资源，仅支持判断使用fwTheme创建的图片资源

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeLight:dark:
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 创建主题模拟动态图像，分别指定浅色和深色，不支持动态切换，需重新赋值才会变化

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeImage:

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeNamed:
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 创建主题模拟动态图像，指定名称，兼容系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态图像)和手工指定，支持动态切换，需配置any和dark

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeNamed:bundle:
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 创建主题模拟动态图像，指定名称和bundle，兼容系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态图像)和手工指定，支持动态切换，需配置any和dark

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_setThemeImage:forName:
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 手工单个注册主题图像，未配置主题图像时可使用本方式

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_setThemeImages:
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 手工批量注册主题图像，未配置主题图像时可使用本方式

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: fw_image
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 获取当前主题样式对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: -fw_imageForStyle:
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 指定主题样式获取对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: fw_isThemeImage
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 是否是主题图片，仅支持判断使用fwTheme创建的图片

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: fw_themeImageColor
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 默认主题图片颜色，未设置时为浅色=>黑色，深色=>白色

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: fw_themeImage
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 快速生成当前图片对应的默认主题图片

Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: -fw_themeImageWithColor:
Categories/UIImage%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 指定主题颜色，快速生成当前图片对应的主题图片

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeLight:dark:
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 动态创建主题色，分别指定浅色和深色

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeColor:
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 动态创建主题色，指定提供句柄

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeNamed:
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 动态创建主题色，指定名称，兼容iOS11+系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态颜色)和手工指定。失败时返回clear防止崩溃

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_themeNamed:bundle:
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 动态创建主题色，指定名称和bundle，兼容iOS11+系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态颜色)和手工指定。失败时返回clear防止崩溃

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_setThemeColor:forName:
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 手工单个注册主题色，未配置主题色或者需兼容iOS11以下时可使用本方式

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: +fw_setThemeColors:
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 手工批量注册主题色，未配置主题色或者需兼容iOS11以下时可使用本方式

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: fw_color
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 获取当前主题样式对应静态颜色，主要用于iOS13以下兼容主题切换

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: -fw_colorForStyle:
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 指定主题样式获取对应静态颜色，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.name: fw_isThemeColor
Categories/UIColor%28FWTheme%29.html#/c:.abstract: 是否是主题颜色，仅支持判断使用fwTheme创建的颜色

Categories/UIScrollView%28FWRefreshPlugi.name: fw_refreshPlugin
Categories/UIScrollView%28FWRefreshPlugi.abstract: 自定义刷新插件，未设置时自动从插件池加载

Categories/UIScrollView%28FWRefreshPlugi.name: fw_loadingFinished
Categories/UIScrollView%28FWRefreshPlugi.abstract: 是否已加载完成，不能继续追加

Categories/CAGradientLayer%28FWQuartzCor.name: fw_themeColors
Categories/CAGradientLayer%28FWQuartzCor.abstract: 设置主题渐变色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.name: fw_themeBackgroundColor
Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.abstract: 设置主题背景色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.name: fw_themeBorderColor
Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.abstract: 设置主题边框色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.name: fw_themeShadowColor
Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.abstract: 设置主题阴影色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.name: fw_themeContents
Categories/CALayer%28FWQuartzCore%29.htm.abstract: 设置主题内容图片，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Categories/CAAnimation%28FWQuartzCore%29.name: fw_startBlock
Categories/CAAnimation%28FWQuartzCore%29.abstract: 设置动画开始回调，需要在add之前添加，因为add时会自动拷贝一份对象

Categories/CADisplayLink%28FWQuartzCore%.name: +fw_commonDisplayLinkWithTarget:selector:
Categories/CADisplayLink%28FWQuartzCore%.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用target-action，自动CommonModes添加到当前的运行循环中，避免ScrollView滚动时不触发

Categories/CADisplayLink%28FWQuartzCore%.name: +fw_commonDisplayLinkWithBlock:
Categories/CADisplayLink%28FWQuartzCore%.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用block，自动CommonModes添加到当前的运行循环中，避免ScrollView滚动时不触发

Categories/CADisplayLink%28FWQuartzCore%.name: +fw_displayLinkWithBlock:
Categories/CADisplayLink%28FWQuartzCore%.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用block，需要调用addToRunLoop:forMode:安排到当前的运行循环中(CommonModes避免ScrollView滚动时不触发)。

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_pushViewController:pop:animated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: push新界面，同时pop指定数量界面，至少保留一个根控制器，完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_popViewControllers:animated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: pop指定数量界面，0不会pop，至少保留一个根控制器，完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: fw_topWorkflowName
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: 当前最外层工作流名称，即topViewController的工作流名称

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_pushViewController:popTopWorkflowAnimated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: push控制器，并清理最外层工作流（不属于工作流则不清理），完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_pushViewController:popToWorkflow:animated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: push控制器，并清理到指定工作流（不属于工作流则清理），完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_pushViewController:popToRootWorkflowAnimated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: push控制器，并清理非根控制器（只保留根控制器），完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_pushViewController:popWorkflows:animated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: push控制器，并从外到内清理指定工作流，直到遇到不属于指定工作流的控制器停止，完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_popTopWorkflowAnimated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: pop方式清理最外层工作流，至少保留一个根控制器（不属于工作流则不清理），完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_popToWorkflow:animated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: pop方式清理到指定工作流，至少保留一个根控制器（不属于工作流则清理），完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.name: -fw_popWorkflows:animated:completion:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWNa.abstract: pop方式从外到内清理指定工作流，直到遇到不属于指定工作流的控制器停止，至少保留一个根控制器，完成时回调

Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.name: fw_topNavigationController
Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.abstract: 获取最顶部的导航栏控制器。如果顶部VC不含导航栏，返回nil

Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.name: -fw_pushViewController:animated:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.abstract: 使用最顶部的导航栏控制器打开控制器

Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.name: -fw_pushViewController:pop:animated:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.abstract: 使用最顶部的导航栏控制器打开控制器，同时pop指定数量控制器

Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.name: -fw_presentViewController:animated:completion:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.abstract: 使用最顶部的显示控制器弹出控制器，建议present导航栏控制器(可用来push)

Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.name: -fw_openViewController:animated:options:completion:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.abstract: 使用最顶部的视图控制器打开控制器，自动判断push|present，完成时回调

Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.name: -fw_closeViewControllerAnimated:options:completion:
Categories/UIWindow%28FWNavigator%29.htm.abstract: 关闭最顶部的视图控制器，自动判断pop|dismiss，返回是否成功，完成时回调

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWFu.name: fw_fullscreenPopGestureEnabled
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWFu.abstract: 是否启用导航栏全屏返回手势，默认NO。启用时系统返回手势失效，禁用时还原系统手势。如果只禁用系统手势，设置interactivePopGestureRecognizer.enabled即可

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWFu.name: +fw_isFullscreenPopGestureRecognizer:
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWFu.abstract: 判断手势是否是全局返回手势对象

Categories/UIToolbar%28FWBarTransition%2.name: fw_backgroundView
Categories/UIToolbar%28FWBarTransition%2.abstract: 工具栏背景视图，显示背景色和背景图片等。如果标签栏同时显示，背景视图高度也会包含标签栏高度

Categories/UIToolbar%28FWBarTransition%2.name: fw_contentView
Categories/UIToolbar%28FWBarTransition%2.abstract: 工具栏内容视图，iOS11+才存在，显示item等

Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.name: fw_backgroundView
Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.abstract: 导航栏背景视图，显示背景色和背景图片等

Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.name: fw_contentView
Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.abstract: 导航栏内容视图，iOS11+才存在，显示item和titleView等

Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.name: fw_largeTitleView
Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.abstract: 导航栏大标题视图，显示时才有值。如果要设置背景色，可使用fwBackgroundView.backgroundColor

Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.name: fw_largeTitleHeight
Categories/UINavigationBar%28FWBarTransi.abstract: 导航栏大标题高度，与是否隐藏无关

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWBa.name: fw_containerBackgroundColor
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWBa.abstract: 自定义转场过程中containerView的背景色，默认透明

Categories/UINavigationController%28FWBa.name: +fw_enableBarTransition
Categories/UINavigationController%28FWBa.abstract: 全局启用NavigationBar转场。启用后各个ViewController管理自己的导航栏样式，在viewDidLoad或viewViewAppear中设置即可

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: fw_currentLanguage
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取应用当前语言，如果localizedLanguage存在则返回，否则返回systemLanguage

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: fw_systemLanguage
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取应用系统语言，返回preferredLocalizations(支持应用设置，不含区域)，示例：zh-Hans|en

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: fw_localizedLanguage
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取或设置自定义本地化语言，未自定义时为空。(语言值对应本地化文件存在才会立即生效，如zh-Hans|en)，为空时清空自定义，会触发通知。默认只处理mainBundle语言，如果需要处理三方SDK和系统组件语言，详见Bundle分类

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取本地化字符串，strings文件需位于mainBundle，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:table:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取本地化字符串，指定table，strings文件需位于mainBundle，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_bundleWithName:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 加载指定名称bundle对象，bundle文件需位于mainBundle

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_bundleWithClass:name:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 加载指定类所在bundle对象，可指定子目录名称，一般用于Framework内bundle文件

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:bundle:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取指定bundle内strings文件本地化字符串，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:table:bundle:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取指定bundle内strings文件本地化字符串，指定table，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: -fw_localizedBundle
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 根据本地化语言加载当前bundle内语言文件，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: -fw_localizedBundleWithLanguage:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 加载当前bundle内指定语言文件，加载失败返回nil

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardManager
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 是否启用键盘管理(自动滚动)，默认NO

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardDistance
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的空白高度，默认10.0

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_reboundDistance
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的回弹触发最小距离，默认0始终回弹

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardResign
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 是否启用键盘后台关闭处理，退后台时收起键盘，回到前台时恢复键盘，解决系统退后台输入框跳动问题，默认NO

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_touchResign
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 是否启用点击背景关闭键盘(会继续触发其它点击事件)，默认NO

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardScrollView
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 指定用于键盘管理滚动的scrollView，默认为nil，通过修改VC.view.frame实现

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_returnResign
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 点击键盘完成按钮是否关闭键盘，默认NO，二选一。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_returnNext
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮是否自动切换下一个输入框，二选一。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_toolBarHidden
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 工具栏是否隐藏，默认为YES。需设置toolbarItems，立即生效

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_setToolBarHidden:animated:

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_extendedLayoutEdge

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_openViewController:animated:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 打开控制器。1.如果打开导航栏，则调用present；2.否则如果导航栏存在，则调用push；3.否则调用present

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_openViewController:animated:options:completion:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 打开控制器。1.如果打开导航栏，则调用present；2.否则如果导航栏存在，则调用push；3.否则调用present，完成时回调

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_closeViewControllerAnimated:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 关闭控制器，返回是否成功。1.如果导航栏不存在，则调用dismiss；2.否则如果已是导航栏底部，则调用dismiss；3.否则调用pop

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_closeViewControllerAnimated:options:completion:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 关闭控制器，返回是否成功。1.如果导航栏不存在，则调用dismiss；2.否则如果已是导航栏底部，则调用dismiss；3.否则调用pop，完成时回调

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_workflowName

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_hideLoading

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isShowingLoading
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 是否正在显示加载吐司

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 显示进度条吐司，需手工隐藏，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_showProgressWithText:progress:cancelBlock:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 显示进度条吐司，默认需手工隐藏，指定cancelBlock时点击会自动隐藏并调用之，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_hideProgress
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 隐藏进度条吐司

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isShowingProgress
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 是否正在显示进度条吐司

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_showMessageWithText:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 显示默认样式消息吐司，自动隐藏，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_showMessageWithText:style:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 显示指定样式消息吐司，自动隐藏，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_showMessageWithText:style:completion:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 显示指定样式消息吐司，自动隐藏，自动隐藏完成后回调，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_showMessageWithText:style:autoHide:interactive:completion:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 显示指定样式消息吐司，可设置自动隐藏和允许交互，自动隐藏完成后回调，支持String和AttributedString

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_hideMessage
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 隐藏消息吐司

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isShowingMessage
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 是否正在显示消息吐司

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_visibleState
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 当前生命周期状态，默认Ready

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_visibleStateChanged
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 生命周期变化时通知句柄，默认nil

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_completionResult
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义完成结果对象，默认nil

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_completionHandler
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义完成句柄，默认nil，dealloc时自动调用，参数为fwCompletionResult。支持提前调用，调用后需置为nil

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_allowsPopGesture
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义侧滑返回手势VC开关句柄，enablePopProxy启用后生效，仅处理边缘返回手势，优先级低，默认nil

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_shouldPopController
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义控制器返回VC开关句柄，enablePopProxy启用后生效，统一处理返回按钮点击和边缘返回手势，优先级高，默认nil

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: allowsPopGesture
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义侧滑返回手势VC开关，enablePopProxy启用后生效，仅处理边缘返回手势，优先级低，自动调用fw.allowsPopGesture，默认YES

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: shouldPopController
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义控制器返回VC开关，enablePopProxy启用后生效，统一处理返回按钮点击和边缘返回手势，优先级高，自动调用fw.shouldPopController，默认YES

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isRoot
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 判断当前控制器是否是根控制器。如果是导航栏的第一个控制器或者不含有导航栏，则返回YES

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isChild
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 判断当前控制器是否是子控制器。如果父控制器存在，且不是导航栏或标签栏控制器，则返回YES

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isPresented
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 判断当前控制器是否是present弹出。如果是导航栏的第一个控制器且导航栏是present弹出，也返回YES

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isPageSheet
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 判断当前控制器是否是iOS13+默认pageSheet弹出样式。该样式下导航栏高度等与默认样式不同

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isViewVisible
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 视图是否可见，viewWillAppear后为YES，viewDidDisappear后为NO

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_ancestorView
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 获取祖先视图，标签栏存在时为标签栏根视图，导航栏存在时为导航栏根视图，否则为控制器根视图

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_isLoaded
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 是否已经加载完，默认NO，加载完成后可标记为YES，可用于第一次加载时显示loading等判断

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_addChildViewController:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 添加子控制器到当前视图，解决不能触发viewWillAppear等的bug

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_addChildViewController:inView:layout:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 添加子控制器到指定视图，可自定义布局，解决不能触发viewWillAppear等的bug

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_removeChildViewController:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 移除子控制器，解决不能触发viewWillAppear等的bug

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_modalTransition
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 视图控制器present|dismiss转场。注意会修改transitioningDelegate，且会强引用之；如需weak引用，请直接设置transitioningDelegate

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_viewTransition
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 视图控制器push|pop转场，代理导航控制器转场，需在fwNavigationTransition设置后生效

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_setPresentTransition:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义控制器present系统转场(蒙层渐变，内容向上动画)，会设置fwModalTransition

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_setAlertTransition:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义控制器alert缩放转场(蒙层渐变，内容缩放动画)，会设置fwModalTransition

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_setFadeTransition:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义控制器fade渐变转场(蒙层和内容渐变动画)，会设置fwModalTransition;

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: fw_presentationDidDismiss
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 设置iOS13默认present手势下拉dismiss时的回调block，仅iOS13生效，自动触发，手工dismiss不会触发。会自动设置presentationController.delegate

Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.name: -fw_setPopoverPresentation:shouldDismiss:
Categories/UIViewController%28FWAdaptive.abstract: 自定义控制器popover弹出效果(preferredContentSize设置大小)，会自动设置modalPresentationStyle和popoverPresentationController.delegate

Categories/UIView%28FWAdaptive%29.html#/.name: fw_autoScaleTransform
Categories/UIView%28FWAdaptive%29.html#/.abstract: 是否自动等比例缩放方式设置transform，默认NO
